mapper.select: SELECT T.ORDER_ID, T.ORIGIN_ORDER_ID, T.ORIGIN_TRANS_TIME ORDER_CREATE_TIME, T.ORIGIN_ORDER_NAME ORDER_NAME, T.REVOKE_CUST_ID PAYER_CUST_ID, T.REVOKE_AMT SUM_AMT, T.ORDER_STATUS REVOKE_STATUS, U.MERCHANT_CODE PAYEE_CUST_ID, LU.MOBILE, (SELECT U.USER_NAME FROM SYS_USER U WHERE U.USER_ID = T.CREATE_ID) CREATOR, T.CREATE_TIME, T.CORE_RETURN_CODE RTN_CODE, T.CORE_RETURN_MSG RTN_INFO FROM TD_CUST_TRANS_REVOKE T, TD_LOGIN_USER_INFO LU,TD_CUST_INFO U WHERE T.REVOKE_CUST_ID = LU.CUST_ID AND T.MERCHANT_CUST_ID = U.CUST_ID AND T.ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}

SELECT T.ORDER_ID, T.ORIGIN_ORDER_ID, T.ORIGIN_RECHARGE_TIME ORDER_CREATE_TIME, T.RECHARGE_CUST_ID PAYER_CUST_ID, T.REVOKE_AMT SUM_AMT, T.ORDER_STATUS REVOKE_STATUS, LU.MOBILE, (SELECT U.USER_NAME FROM SYS_USER U WHERE U.USER_ID = T.CREATE_ID) CREATOR, T.CREATE_TIME INST_DATETIME, T.CORE_RETURN_CODE RTN_CODE, T.CORE_RETURN_MSG RTN_INFO FROM TD_CUST_RECHARGE_REVOKE T, TD_LOGIN_USER_INFO LU WHERE T.RECHARGE_CUST_ID = LU.CUST_ID AND T.ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}

SELECT T.ORDER_ID, T.ORIGIN_ORDER_ID, T.ORIGIN_TRANS_TIME ORDER_CREATE_TIME, LU.MOBILE PAY_CUST_ID, T.REVOKE_AMT SUM_AMT, T.ORDER_STATUS REVOKE_STATUS, U.MOBILE RCV_CUST_ID, T.PAYEE_CUST_NAME PAY_CUST_NAME, T.PAYER_CUST_NAME RCV_CUST_NAME, (SELECT U.USER_NAME FROM SYS_USER U WHERE U.USER_ID = T.CREATE_ID) CREATOR, T.CREATE_TIME INST_DATETIME, T.CORE_RETURN_CODE RTN_CODE, T.CORE_RETURN_MSG RTN_INFO FROM TD_CUST_TRANSFER_REVOKE T, TD_LOGIN_USER_INFO LU, TD_LOGIN_USER_INFO U WHERE T.PAYEE_CUST_ID = LU.CUST_ID AND T.PAYER_CUST_ID = U.CUST_ID AND T.ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}
